description: Enterprise techniques used by ISMInjector, ATT&CK software S0189 v1.1
name: ISMInjector (S0189)

techniques.comment: [ISMInjector](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0189) uses the certutil command to decode a payload file.(Citation: OilRig New Delivery Oct 2017)
[ISMInjector](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0189) is obfuscated with the off-the-shelf SmartAssembly .NET obfuscator created by red-gate.com.(Citation: OilRig New Delivery Oct 2017)
[ISMInjector](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0189) hollows out a newly created process RegASM.exe and injects its payload into the hollowed process.(Citation: OilRig New Delivery Oct 2017)
[ISMInjector](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0189) creates scheduled tasks to establish persistence.(Citation: OilRig New Delivery Oct 2017)
